summary: The Gateway Arch is a huge monument in St. Louis, Missouri, standing at 630 feet tall. It's made of stainless steel and shaped like an arch. It's the tallest arch in the world and a famous symbol of St. Louis. The arch was designed by architect Eero Saarinen and built between 1963 and 1965. It celebrates the expansion of the United States to the west and is now a popular tourist spot. The arch is located where St. Louis was founded in 1764, on the Mississippi River's west bank.
title: Gateway Arch
